abstract: Wal-Mart filed a legal brief on Monday directly contradicting the statements of two former marketing officials who were fired late last year.
snippet: Wal-Mart filed a legal brief on Monday directly contradicting the statements of two former marketing officials who were fired late last year.
lead_paragraph: Wal-Mart asserted yesterday in a court filing that two of its former top marketing officials had engaged in a sexual relationship during the process of selecting new advertising agencies and had sought jobs with one of the agencies they ultimately recommended.

byline.original: By Louise Story and Michael Barbaro
